scripts.dev: concurrently "parcel watch app/scripts/index.js --out-dir ./assets --out-file bundle.min.js" "parcel watch app/styles/index.scss --out-dir ./assets --out-file style.min.css" "theme watch"
scripts.build: parcel build app/scripts/index.js --out-dir ./assets --out-file bundle.min.js --no-source-maps && parcel build app/styles/index.scss --out-dir ./assets --out-file style.min.css --no-source-maps
scripts.deploy: yarn && yarn build && yarn clean && theme deploy
